code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Button}from"./Button";import"./Navbar.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){const[click,setClick]=useState(false);const[,setButton]=useState(true);const handleClick=()=>setClick(!click);const closeMobileMenu=()=>setClick(false);const showButton=()=>{if(window.innerWidth<=960){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);}};useEffect(()=>{showButton();},[]);window.addEventListener("resize",showButton);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"John PharmAssist"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-icon",onClick:handleClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:click?"fas fa-times":"fas fa-bars"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:click?"nav-menu active":"nav-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Products"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/aboutus",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"About Us"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contactus",className:"nav-links",onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Contact Us"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{to:"/sign-up",buttonStyle:"btn--outline",children:["Log-in ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-arrow-right"})]})})]})]})})});}export default Navbar;
